message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for you, considering the value you place on it. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I can only afford to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm hoping for something a little closer to my asking price.  Would you be willing to meet me at $11,000?  I believe this is still a good deal for you, given the value you've placed on the product.
